00029 int RealDiskInterface::Stat(const string& path) {
00030   struct stat st;
00031   if (stat(path.c_str(), &st) < 0) {
00032     if (errno == ENOENT) {
00033       return 0;
00034     } else {
00035       Error("stat(%s): %s", path.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00036       return -1;
00037     }
00038   }
00039 
00040   return st.st_mtime;
00041   return true;
00042 }
00043 
00044 string DirName(const string& path) {
00045   string::size_type slash_pos = path.rfind('/');
00046   if (slash_pos == string::npos)
00047     return "";  // Nothing to do.
00048   while (slash_pos > 0 && path[slash_pos - 1] == '/')
00049     --slash_pos;
00050   return path.substr(0, slash_pos);
00051 }
00052 
00053 bool DiskInterface::MakeDirs(const string& path) {
00054   string dir = DirName(path);
00055   if (dir.empty())
00056     return true;  // Reached root; assume it's there.
00057   int mtime = Stat(dir);
00058   if (mtime < 0)
00059     return false;  // Error.
00060   if (mtime > 0)
00061     return true;  // Exists already; we're done.
00062 
00063   // Directory doesn't exist.  Try creating its parent first.
00064   bool success = MakeDirs(dir);
00065   if (!success)
00066     return false;
00067   return MakeDir(dir);
00068 }
00069 
00070 string RealDiskInterface::ReadFile(const string& path, string* err) {
00071   string contents;
00072   int ret = ::ReadFile(path, &contents, err);
00073   if (ret == -ENOENT) {
00074     // Swallow ENOENT.
00075     err->clear();
00076   }
00077   return contents;
00078 }
00079 
00080 bool RealDiskInterface::MakeDir(const string& path) {
00081   if (::MakeDir(path) < 0) {
00082     Error("mkdir(%s): %s", path.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00083     return false;
00084   }
00085   return true;
00086 }
00087 
00088 int RealDiskInterface::RemoveFile(const string& path) {
00089   if (remove(path.c_str()) < 0) {
00090     switch (errno) {
00091       case ENOENT:
00092         return 1;
00093       default:
00094         Error("remove(%s): %s", path.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00095         return -1;
00096     }
00097   } else {
00098     return 0;
00099   }
00100 }
00101 
00102 FileStat* StatCache::GetFile(const string& path) {
00103   Paths::iterator i = paths_.find(path);
00104   if (i != paths_.end())
00105     return i->second;
00106   FileStat* file = new FileStat(path);
00107   paths_[path] = file;
00108   return file;
00109 }
00110 
00111 void StatCache::Dump() {
00112   for (Paths::iterator i = paths_.begin(); i != paths_.end(); ++i) {
00113     FileStat* file = i->second;
00114     printf("%s %s\n",
00115            file->path_.c_str(),
00116            file->status_known()
00117            ? (file->node_->dirty_ ? "dirty" : "clean")
00118            : "unknown");
00119   }
00120 }

00122 const Rule State::kPhonyRule("phony");
00123 
00124 State::State() : build_log_(NULL) {
00125   AddRule(&kPhonyRule);
00126 }
00127 
00128 const Rule* State::LookupRule(const string& rule_name) {
00129   map<string, const Rule*>::iterator i = rules_.find(rule_name);
00130   if (i == rules_.end())
00131     return NULL;
00132   return i->second;
00133 }
00134 
00135 void State::AddRule(const Rule* rule) {
00136   assert(LookupRule(rule->name_) == NULL);
00137   rules_[rule->name_] = rule;
00138 }
00139 
00140 Edge* State::AddEdge(const Rule* rule) {
00141   Edge* edge = new Edge();
00142   edge->rule_ = rule;
00143   edge->env_ = &bindings_;
00144   edges_.push_back(edge);
00145   return edge;
00146 }
00147 
00148 Node* State::LookupNode(const string& path) {
00149   FileStat* file = stat_cache_.GetFile(path);
00150   if (!file->node_)
00151     return NULL;
00152   return file->node_;
00153 }
00154 
00155 Node* State::GetNode(const string& path) {
00156   FileStat* file = stat_cache_.GetFile(path);
00157   if (!file->node_)
00158     file->node_ = new Node(file);
00159   return file->node_;
00160 }
00161 
00162 void State::AddIn(Edge* edge, const string& path) {
00163   Node* node = GetNode(path);
00164   edge->inputs_.push_back(node);
00165   node->out_edges_.push_back(edge);
00166 }
00167 
00168 void State::AddOut(Edge* edge, const string& path) {
00169   Node* node = GetNode(path);
00170   edge->outputs_.push_back(node);
00171   if (node->in_edge_) {
00172     Warning("multiple rules generate %s. "
00173             "build will not be correct; continuing anyway", path.c_str());
00174   }
00175   node->in_edge_ = edge;
00176 }
00177 
00178 vector<Node*> State::RootNodes(string* err) {
00179   vector<Node*> root_nodes;
00180   // Search for nodes with no output.
00181   for (vector<Edge*>::iterator e = edges_.begin(); e != edges_.end(); ++e) {
00182     for (vector<Node*>::iterator out = (*e)->outputs_.begin();
00183          out != (*e)->outputs_.end(); ++out) {
00184       if ((*out)->out_edges_.empty())
00185         root_nodes.push_back(*out);
00186     }
00187   }
00188 
00189   if (!edges_.empty() && root_nodes.empty())
00190     *err = "could not determine root nodes of build graph";
00191 
00192   assert(edges_.empty() || !root_nodes.empty());
00193   return root_nodes;
00194 }
